patthana10.4:1.1_0: Nakusalaṁ naappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ naasaṅkhataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana10.4:2.1_1: ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
patthana10.4:4.1_1: ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
patthana10.4:6.1_1: ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
patthana10.4:10.1_0: Hetuyā catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
patthana10.4:14.1_0: Hetuyā sattarasa …pe… āsevane nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate sattarasa.
patthana10.4:16.1_1: ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
patthana10.4:17.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nanakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana10.4:18.1_1: ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
